title: octobuzz
author: octobuzz
content: So I noticed that threads on this forum are usually tense and serious so I decided to make a thread with a bit of comic relief 😄Let's make this worthwhile 😁Here's a joke from me 😂Me: Dad, can bitcoin make me a millionaire?Dad: Yeah, if you are already a billionaire.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Bitcoin stole its name from the Old West gold coins. Gold coins were soft, because gold is soft. So, to test them to make sure they were really gold, people would bite them to see if they left tooth marks. Bit gold coins were the first Bitcoin.

comments.author: Quickex Exchange
comments.body: Why did the Quickex Exchange user have to sell their Bitcoin?Because they needed some "quick cash" for a big purchase!

comments.author: dumbasspiper
comments.body: Why did the Bitcoin go to the gym? To pump up its value!

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: octobuzz on April 19, 2023, 04:21:29 PMSo I noticed that threads on this forum are usually tense and serious so I decided to make a thread with a bit of comic relief 😄Let's make this worthwhile 😁Here's a joke from me 😂Me: Dad, can bitcoin make me a millionaire?Dad: Yeah, if you are already a billionaire.Knock knockWho's there?It's bitcoinBitcoinBitcoin who?Bitcoin to make you richBitcoin is virtual, it cannot knock. bye

comments.author: lolita24
comments.body: Why did the chicken cross the blockchain?To get to the other side(chain)!

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Why shouldn’t you bother someone who collects bitcoins?Because they’re mining their own businessWhy did the Bitcoin go to the gym?To pump its value
